SymbolDef.descr: SimProp mission property, type and set definitions.

PropertyDef.name: AllowCrash
PropertyDef.descr: When a CrashTrigger is executed, the crash can be 'cancelled' by setting this boolean to False

PropertyDef.name: DisqualifyReason
PropertyDef.descr: Reason of the disqualification

PropertyDef.name: TransitionUrl
PropertyDef.descr: See TransitionAction and (in cpp) TransitionData

PropertyDef.name: TransitionTag
PropertyDef.descr: See TransitionAction and (in cpp) TransitionData

PropertyDef.name: TransitionLogo
PropertyDef.descr: Logo url for generic Activity transitions

PropertyDef.name: TransitionBackgroundImage
PropertyDef.descr: Background image url for generic Activity transitions

PropertyDef.name: TransitionArrowColor
PropertyDef.descr: Arrow color for generic Activity transitions

PropertyDef.name: TransitionTextTop
PropertyDef.descr: See TransitionAction and (in cpp) TransitionData

PropertyDef.name: TransitionTextBottom
PropertyDef.descr: See TransitionAction and (in cpp) TransitionData

PropertyDef.name: TransitionLaunchSound
PropertyDef.descr: Sound name launched when transition starts

PropertyDef.name: TransitionFinishSound
PropertyDef.descr: Sound name launched when the transition starts its finish animation

PropertyDef.name: TransitionFadeInEvent
PropertyDef.descr: Name of the event that ends a transition action

PropertyDef.name: TransitionFadeOutEvent
PropertyDef.descr: Name of the event that ends a transition action

PropertyDef.name: HideLogoOnEvent
PropertyDef.descr: Name of the event that ends a transition action

PropertyDef.name: EndTransitionOnEvent
PropertyDef.descr: Name of the event that ends a transition action

PropertyDef.name: CameraNameCFG
PropertyDef.descr: Name of the camera in the CFG file to extract position

PropertyDef.name: GhostAlpha
PropertyDef.descr: Ghost opacity between 0 (transparent) and 1 (opaque)

PropertyDef.name: GhostNameplate
PropertyDef.descr: Content of ghost nameplate. If empty (or not present), the ghost has no nameplate

PropertyDef.name: ProceduralRacePointCount
PropertyDef.descr: Number of race point generated in a race course between the start and the end

PropertyDef.name: PageName
PropertyDef.descr: Title of a reward screen page

PropertyDef.name: TabName
PropertyDef.descr: Title of a reward screen tab

PropertyDef.name: SkipDuration
PropertyDef.descr: Time skipped in seconds in a SkipTimeAction

PropertyDef.name: SkipTransitionDuration
PropertyDef.descr: Total time in seconds of skipping in a SkipTimeAction

PropertyDef.name: DecalObjectSize
PropertyDef.descr: Size of a DecalObject

PropertyDef.name: replayPath
PropertyDef.descr: Path to a subdirectory

PropertyDef.name: SoundFileName
PropertyDef.descr: Filename of the sound file

PropertyDef.name: PackageName
PropertyDef.descr: Filename of the package

PropertyDef.name: WwiseEventName
PropertyDef.descr: Name of a Wwise event

PropertyDef.name: FadeOutTime
PropertyDef.descr: Fade out time (in sec)

PropertyDef.name: DopplerEnabled
PropertyDef.descr: Doppler enabled

PropertyDef.name: WwiseRTPCName
PropertyDef.descr: Name of a Wwise RTPC

PropertyDef.name: WwiseRTPCValue
PropertyDef.descr: Value of a Wwise RTPC

PropertyDef.name: AttackTime
PropertyDef.descr: AttackTime of a Wwise RTPC

PropertyDef.name: ReleaseTime
PropertyDef.descr: ReleaseTime of a Wwise RTPC

PropertyDef.name: Length
PropertyDef.descr: Units are meters

PropertyDef.name: Width
PropertyDef.descr: Units are meters

PropertyDef.name: Height
PropertyDef.descr: Units are meters

PropertyDef.name: NumberOfSeconds
PropertyDef.descr: Number of seconds to show the text

PropertyDef.name: NewObjectState
PropertyDef.descr: True: Change trigger to be activated. False: Change the trigger to be non-activated.

PropertyDef.name: AIControl
PropertyDef.descr: True: AI takes controls. False: Human has controls. Default: Assistance value

PropertyDef.name: AddPlayer
PropertyDef.descr: True: LLa of the player is added in the barycenter

PropertyDef.name: SimActionsLimited
PropertyDef.descr: True: AI controls are limited. False: Sim has all the controls.

PropertyDef.name: DisableCockpitInteraction
PropertyDef.descr: Disable cursor interaction in cockpit view

PropertyDef.name: CurrentTime
PropertyDef.descr: Current time of the timer trigger.

PropertyDef.name: StartTime
PropertyDef.descr: Number of seconds to start counting

PropertyDef.name: StopTime
PropertyDef.descr: Number of seconds in stop counting

PropertyDef.name: OnScreenTimer
PropertyDef.descr: True: Use this trigger as the onscreen timer.

PropertyDef.name: StaysVisible
PropertyDef.descr: If true, timer will stay on screen after deactivation

PropertyDef.name: DeltaTime
PropertyDef.descr: Number of seconds adjust time by

PropertyDef.name: CanBeUpdatedDuringLoading
PropertyDef.descr: Time can be updated during loading

PropertyDef.name: DeltaEventTime
PropertyDef.descr: Number of seconds between two (same) events

PropertyDef.name: EventReference
PropertyDef.descr: Name of the event we want to subscribe for

PropertyDef.name: Repeat
PropertyDef.descr: If the Action should be repeat

PropertyDef.name: RandomizeInList
PropertyDef.descr: True: Randomize the playlist item in the list. False: Play at its current position in the list.

PropertyDef.name: PreserveInstanceId
PropertyDef.descr: True: Preserve the instance id of spawned objects. False: Don't spawn objects already existing objects.

PropertyDef.name: AirportIdent
PropertyDef.descr: Airport Identifier. ex: KSEA

PropertyDef.name: LandingType
PropertyDef.descr: Type of Landing to detect

PropertyDef.name: RunwayNumber
PropertyDef.descr: Runway Number

PropertyDef.name: RunwayDesignator
PropertyDef.descr: Runway Designator

PropertyDef.name: Latched
PropertyDef.descr: True after a trigger has fired, false otherwise

PropertyDef.name: DefaultActivated
PropertyDef.descr: Default state of activate flg

PropertyDef.name: UseFirstFlightState
PropertyDef.descr: Use default state defined in .flt

PropertyDef.name: ExcludeScheduledBoats
PropertyDef.descr: Exclude Living World Scheduled Boats

PropertyDef.name: ExcludeRandomBoats
PropertyDef.descr: Exclude Living World Random Boats

PropertyDef.name: ExcludeFreewayTraffic
PropertyDef.descr: Exclude Living World Freeway Traffic

PropertyDef.name: ExcludeAircraft
PropertyDef.descr: Exclude Living World AI Aircraft

PropertyDef.name: ExcludeAirportVehicles
PropertyDef.descr: Exclude Living World airport ground vehicles

PropertyDef.name: Name
PropertyDef.descr: Simulation variable name

PropertyDef.name: Units
PropertyDef.descr: Simulation variable units

PropertyDef.name: Index
PropertyDef.descr: Simulation variable index

PropertyDef.name: Number
PropertyDef.descr: Constant numeric value

PropertyDef.name: Boolean
PropertyDef.descr: Constant boolean value

PropertyDef.name: SystemIndex
PropertyDef.desc: System index for multiple instance systems - e.g. engines

PropertyDef.name: HealthPercent
PropertyDef.desc: Health level to set or check for

PropertyDef.name: Behavior
PropertyDef.desc: Specifies a system damage behavior to set or check for

PropertyDef.name: AdjustmentType
PropertyDef.desc: Specifies how the payload on a station is to be adjusted

PropertyDef.name: Weight
PropertyDef.desc: Weight to set or add to/subtract from station

PropertyDef.name: Count
PropertyDef.desc: Amount to decrement counter trigger by

PropertyDef.name: TargetName
PropertyDef.descr: Name of the target

PropertyDef.name: CameraName
PropertyDef.descr: Name of the camera

PropertyDef.name: CameraGUID
PropertyDef.descr: Guid of the camera

PropertyDef.name: DelaySeconds
PropertyDef.descr: Number of seconds to delay

PropertyDef.name: EndActionsDelaySeconds
PropertyDef.descr: Number of seconds to delay

PropertyDef.name: StateChange
PropertyDef.descr: Force state change for an object

PropertyDef.name: GoalState
PropertyDef.descr: Current state of a goal

PropertyDef.name: SubGoalState
PropertyDef.descr: Current state of a sub goal

PropertyDef.name: GoalResolution
PropertyDef.descr: Resolution of a goal

PropertyDef.name: SubGoalResolution
PropertyDef.descr: Resolution of a sub goal

PropertyDef.name: Order
PropertyDef.descr: Order of appearance in UI

PropertyDef.name: Description
PropertyDef.descr: Description to appear in UI

PropertyDef.name: CurrentActionIndex
PropertyDef.descr: Index of next action to play

PropertyDef.name: FlyingTips
PropertyDef.descr: Flying tip setting override

PropertyDef.name: CrashBehavior
PropertyDef.descr: Crash behavior setting override

PropertyDef.name: UnlimitedFuel
PropertyDef.descr: Unlimited fuel setting override

PropertyDef.name: AircraftLabels
PropertyDef.descr: Aircraft label setting override

PropertyDef.name: FlightRealism
PropertyDef.descr: Limits access to some features that affect flight realism

PropertyDef.name: ATCMenuDisabled
PropertyDef.descr: Disables text and input to the ATC menu when true

PropertyDef.name: MaxAutogen
PropertyDef.descr: Max Autogen setting for this mission

PropertyDef.name: MinAutogen
PropertyDef.descr: Min Autogen setting for this mission

PropertyDef.name: MaxScenery
PropertyDef.descr: Max Scenery Complexity setting for this mission

PropertyDef.name: MinScenery
PropertyDef.descr: Min Scenery Complexity setting for this mission

PropertyDef.name: MaxWater
PropertyDef.descr: Max Water setting for this mission. Value from 0 to 7

PropertyDef.name: MinWater
PropertyDef.descr: Min Water setting for this mission. Value from 0 to 7

PropertyDef.name: PayloadName
PropertyDef.descr: Name of droppable payload object

PropertyDef.name: PayloadCount
PropertyDef.descr: Number of droppable payload objects

PropertyDef.name: SelectedModelGuid
PropertyDef.descr: Guid of the model when the point of interest is selected

PropertyDef.name: UnselectedModelGuid
PropertyDef.descr: Guid of the model when the point of interest is unselected

PropertyDef.name: PropertySource
PropertyDef.descr: Selects the object to provide a property value in the context of an expression evaluation

PropertyDef.name: UseTargetPosition
PropertyDef.descr: If true the picture in picture view will try to keep the target position in view

PropertyDef.name: RootPosition
PropertyDef.descr: Specify what kind of LLAPBH position to retrieve from current mission.

PropertyDef.name: RootGUID
PropertyDef.descr: GUID of the object we want to be the root of the RTC

PropertyDef.name: TargetLinked
PropertyDef.descr: GUID of the object we want to be the root of the RTC

PropertyDef.name: BreadcrumbReference
PropertyDef.descr: GUID of the Breadcrumb

PropertyDef.name: RaceCourseReference
PropertyDef.descr: GUID of the RaceCourse

PropertyDef.name: QuitMulti
PropertyDef.descr: Wether to disable GAMESERVICE_MULTIPLAYER or not when the replay start playing.

PropertyDef.name: DefinedReplayPosition
PropertyDef.descr: If you want the replay to start or end at the defined worldPosition and rotation

PropertyDef.name: CreateActor
PropertyDef.descr: True: The replay will create an actor and play the replay on it instead on the plane

PropertyDef.name: ReplayStartTime
PropertyDef.descr: Replay start time

PropertyDef.name: ReplayStopTime
PropertyDef.descr: Replay stop time

PropertyDef.name: ReplayBookmarkIn
PropertyDef.descr: First Bookmark to play a replay

PropertyDef.name: ReplayBookmarkOut
PropertyDef.descr: Last Bookmark to play a replay

PropertyDef.name: DeferredLoading
PropertyDef.descr: If True, the replay is loaded when executed, else, the replay is loaded at the creation of the action

PropertyDef.name: MaxRecordedTime
PropertyDef.descr: If 0.f, and infnitely long replay is recorded, else, the replay is stopped at MaxRecordedTime value

PropertyDef.name: Interpolation
PropertyDef.descr: specifu the type for interpolation to play the shot

PropertyDef.name: CameraBehaviourType
PropertyDef.descr: Specify what kind of LLAPBH position to retrieve from current mission.

PropertyDef.name: ReplayType
PropertyDef.descr: Specify The subject we want to record

PropertyDef.name: ReplaySubject
PropertyDef.descr: Specify what kind of replay we need to record

PropertyDef.name: CameraBehaviourStrAttribute
PropertyDef.descr: Name of an attribute associated to the behaviour

PropertyDef.name: AnimationGUID
PropertyDef.descr: Animation identifier

PropertyDef.name: RandomStartAnimationTime
PropertyDef.descr: Percent of the animation time to start

PropertyDef.name: AnimationName
PropertyDef.descr: Name of the animation within the resource file

PropertyDef.name: BlendTreeStateName
PropertyDef.descr: Name of the blend tree state

PropertyDef.name: BlendTreeLayerName
PropertyDef.descr: Name of the layer containing the blend tree state

PropertyDef.name: CameraNodeName
PropertyDef.descr: Name of the hierarchy node where the camera should be attached

PropertyDef.name: TargetNodeName
PropertyDef.descr: Name of the hierarchy node where the camera's target should be attached

PropertyDef.name: idRegion
PropertyDef.descr: Id of the region (ICAO)

PropertyDef.name: SpentTime
PropertyDef.descr: Amount of time spent

PropertyDef.name: HasOverridePriority
PropertyDef.descr: If true the RTC will play immediately (instead of queuein) and skip already playing RTCs (if any)

PropertyDef.name: Skippable
PropertyDef.descr: If true the animation is skippable

PropertyDef.name: IsFirstStateInTimeline
PropertyDef.descr: If true the state is the first in timeline

PropertyDef.name: AvailableInTimeLine
PropertyDef.descr: If true the state is available in timeline

PropertyDef.name: ForceATCState
PropertyDef.descr: ForceATC State on EnterState if State is not skipped

PropertyDef.name: DoNotTeleport
PropertyDef.descr: Do not teleport if previous State is skipped

PropertyDef.name: FromSpawn
PropertyDef.descr: True if it's the first state

PropertyDef.name: StayInStateAfterEndTeleportActions
PropertyDef.descr: Stay in current state after end of teleport

PropertyDef.name: FirstState
PropertyDef.descr: If true the state is the First State in the gameflight's flow

PropertyDef.name: StepName
PropertyDef.descr: name of the step

PropertyDef.name: CameraLinkedToPlayer
PropertyDef.descr: If true the animation is link to the player

PropertyDef.name: TargetLinkedToPlayer
PropertyDef.descr: If true the animation is link to the player

PropertyDef.name: InName
PropertyDef.descr: name of an in entry in a replay file

PropertyDef.name: FileGUID
PropertyDef.descr: GUID of the file to load

PropertyDef.name: Pausable
PropertyDef.descr: If true the animation can be paused by the menu.

PropertyDef.name: FadeFromBlack
PropertyDef.descr: If true the RTCSequencer starts with FadeFromBlack.

PropertyDef.name: FadeToBlack
PropertyDef.descr: If true the RTCSequencer ends with FadeToBlack.

PropertyDef.name: Shuffle
PropertyDef.descr: If true the rtc sequences are shuffled

PropertyDef.name: ReuseSameCycle
PropertyDef.descr: If true the rtc sequencer is shuffled again at the end of a cycle

PropertyDef.name: AllowPlayerControl
PropertyDef.descr: If true the rtc sequencer is shuffled again at the end of a cycle

PropertyDef.name: NeedPreload
PropertyDef.descr: If true the rtc sequencer needs specific streaming

PropertyDef.name: AnimationEventType
PropertyDef.descr: Specify the type of the event animation, by default it's a wow effect

PropertyDef.name: ShotType
PropertyDef.descr: Specify the behaviour of the rtcsequencer if no actions is specified.

PropertyDef.name: ShotCount
PropertyDef.descr: Number of camera shots to be included in the RTC.

PropertyDef.name: FileToInclude
PropertyDef.descr: file to be included in the RTC.

PropertyDef.name: PathToInclude
PropertyDef.descr: path to be included in the RTC. Allow to include subfolder that are not includes by default

PropertyDef.name: PathToExclude
PropertyDef.descr: path to be excluded in the RTC.

PropertyDef.name: FovLength
PropertyDef.descr: specifying the fov wanted

PropertyDef.name: UseGltfFov
PropertyDef.descr: Apply the focus on front (TRUE = front can be blurry)

PropertyDef.name: SmoothTimeFov
PropertyDef.descr: specifying the time in seconds to switch to the fov wanted

PropertyDef.name: Blur
PropertyDef.descr: specifying the blur wanted

PropertyDef.name: FocaleDist
PropertyDef.descr: If not equal 0, deactive the autofocus and set a constant focal distance

PropertyDef.name: Activate
PropertyDef.descr: Activate or deactive the script managing the depth of field (deactivate-it if you don't want any blur)

PropertyDef.name: ApplyFrontFocus
PropertyDef.descr: Apply the focus on front (TRUE = front can be blurry)

PropertyDef.name: AutoFocusSpeed
PropertyDef.descr: Coefficient for the autofocus speed: 0= will not do any focus 1= instant focus

PropertyDef.name: GroundOffset
PropertyDef.descr: Additionnal groundOffset you

PropertyDef.name: AnimationToInclude
PropertyDef.descr: file to be included in the RTC.

PropertyDef.name: AnimationToExclude
PropertyDef.descr: file to be excluded in the RTC.

PropertyDef.name: FileToExclude
PropertyDef.descr: file to be excluded in the RTC.

PropertyDef.name: LoopAnimation
PropertyDef.descr: If true animation is looped

PropertyDef.name: MinimumModelScale
PropertyDef.descr: Minimum scale applied to models

PropertyDef.name: MaximumModelScale
PropertyDef.descr: Maximum scale applied to models

PropertyDef.name: MinimumScaleDistance
PropertyDef.descr: Minimum distance beyond which models are no longer scaled down

PropertyDef.name: MaximumScaleDistance
PropertyDef.descr: Maximum distance beyond which models are no longer scaled up

PropertyDef.name: ViewCloseDelay
PropertyDef.descr: Time between end of tracking and closing of view

PropertyDef.name: CameraDistance
PropertyDef.descr: Distance from the camera to the tracked object (meters)

PropertyDef.name: CameraOffsetY
PropertyDef.descr: Vertical adjustment to camera position (meters)

PropertyDef.name: CameraPitch
PropertyDef.descr: Camera angle relative to tracked object (degrees)

PropertyDef.name: SinkTransitionSize
PropertyDef.descr: Relative radius of the outside-to-sink layer of a thermal

PropertyDef.name: SinkLayerSize
PropertyDef.descr: Relative radius of the sink layer of a thermal

PropertyDef.name: CoreTransitionSize
PropertyDef.descr: Relative radius of the sink-to-core layer of a thermal

PropertyDef.name: CoreSize
PropertyDef.descr: Relative radius of the core layer of a thermal

PropertyDef.name: BaseHeight
PropertyDef.descr: Size of the base layer of a thermal in meters

PropertyDef.name: TopHeight
PropertyDef.descr: Size of the top layer of a thermal in meters

PropertyDef.name: SinkRate
PropertyDef.descr: Thermal sink speed in meters per second

PropertyDef.name: SinkTurbulence
PropertyDef.descr: Amount of turbulence in a thermal sink layer (0=none, 1=maximum)

PropertyDef.name: CoreRate
PropertyDef.descr: Thermal updraft speed in meters per second

PropertyDef.name: CoreTurbulence
PropertyDef.descr: Amount of turbulence in an thermal updraft (0=none, 1=maximum)

PropertyDef.name: AirObjectModelGuid
PropertyDef.descr: Model to use for visualization

PropertyDef.name: ReversePolishCondition
PropertyDef.descr: Reverse polish condition for PropertyTrigger

PropertyDef.name: ScaleModel
PropertyDef.descr: If true model is scale to fit actual thermal dimensions

PropertyDef.name: ProbabilityPercent
PropertyDef.descr: Precentage (0 to 100) chance the action will occur

PropertyDef.name: CoreRateScalar
PropertyDef.descr: Ridge lift updraft intensity scalar

PropertyDef.name: SinkRateScalar
PropertyDef.descr: Ridge lift sink intensity scalar

PropertyDef.name: Duration
PropertyDef.descr: Duration in seconds

PropertyDef.name: ShotDuration
PropertyDef.descr: Shot duration in seconds

PropertyDef.name: Intensity
PropertyDef.descr: Intensity of rumble effect

PropertyDef.name: PayloadString
PropertyDef.descr: Payload string

PropertyDef.name: WaitForCompletion
PropertyDef.descr: Wait for action to be completed

PropertyDef.name: RadiusMin
PropertyDef.descr: Minimum radius for autogenerated thermal

PropertyDef.name: RadiusMax
PropertyDef.descr: Maximum radius for autogenerated thermal

PropertyDef.name: HeightMin
PropertyDef.descr: Minimum height for autogenerated thermal

PropertyDef.name: HeightMax
PropertyDef.descr: Maximum height for autogenerated thermal

PropertyDef.name: CoreRateMin
PropertyDef.descr: Minimum core updraft speed for autogenerated thermal

PropertyDef.name: CoreRateMax
PropertyDef.descr: Maximum core updraft speed for autogenerated thermal

PropertyDef.name: CoreTurbulenceMin
PropertyDef.descr: Minimum core turbulence for autogenerated thermal

PropertyDef.name: CoreTurbulenceMax
PropertyDef.descr: Maximum core turbulence for autogenerated thermal

PropertyDef.name: SinkRateMin
PropertyDef.descr: Minimum sink speed for autogenerated thermal

PropertyDef.name: SinkRateMax
PropertyDef.descr: Maximum sink speed for autogenerated thermal

PropertyDef.name: SinkTurbulenceMin
PropertyDef.descr: Minimum sink turbulence for autogenerated thermal

PropertyDef.name: SinkTurbulenceMax
PropertyDef.descr: Maximum sink turbulence for autogenerated thermal

PropertyDef.name: CoreSizeMin
PropertyDef.descr: Minimum relative size of core for autogenerated thermal

PropertyDef.name: CoreSizeMax
PropertyDef.descr: Maximum relative size of core for autogenerated thermal

PropertyDef.name: CoreTransitionSizeMin
PropertyDef.descr: Minimum relative size of core transition zone for autogenerated thermal

PropertyDef.name: CoreTransitionSizeMax
PropertyDef.descr: Maximum relative size of core transition zone for autogenerated thermal

PropertyDef.name: SinkSizeMin
PropertyDef.descr: Minimum relative size of sink zone for autogenerated thermal

PropertyDef.name: SinkSizeMax
PropertyDef.descr: Maximum relative size of sink zone for autogenerated thermal

PropertyDef.name: SinkTransitionSizeMin
PropertyDef.descr: Minimum relative size of sink transition zone for autogenerated thermal

PropertyDef.name: SinkTransitionSizeMax
PropertyDef.descr: Maximum relative size of sink transition zone for autogenerated thermal

PropertyDef.name: Airspeed
PropertyDef.descr: Airspeed in knots

PropertyDef.name: QualificationsAirspeed
PropertyDef.descr: Airspeed in knots for qualifications

PropertyDef.name: TimeOffsetAtStart
PropertyDef.descr: Time offset to delay the start

PropertyDef.name: IsCinematic
PropertyDef.descr: Is this Camera used for a cinematic cutscene?

PropertyDef.name: Exists
PropertyDef.descr: Does this object exist?

PropertyDef.name: PercentFuel
PropertyDef.desc: Percent fuel to add or subtract

PropertyDef.name: PercentNitrous
PropertyDef.desc: Percent Nitrous to add or subtract

PropertyDef.name: PercentAntiDetonation
PropertyDef.desc: Percent ADI fluid to add or subtract

PropertyDef.name: FocusDuration
PropertyDef.descr: Focus duration in seconds

PropertyDef.name: InsideDirection
PropertyDef.descr: When facing the pylon, which direction is inside?

PropertyDef.name: IgnoreDistance
PropertyDef.descr: Distance at which the pylon will not register a passing player

PropertyDef.name: PenaltyHeight
PropertyDef.descr: Passing the pylon at this height or higher is a penalty

PropertyDef.name: AbovePenalty
PropertyDef.descr: Passing too high costs you this many seconds

PropertyDef.name: InsidePenalty
PropertyDef.descr: Passing inside the pylon costs you this many seconds

PropertyDef.name: ConditionPenalty
PropertyDef.descr: Seconds penalized for failing to meet condition when passing this point.

PropertyDef.name: PenaltyWidth
PropertyDef.descr: Passing the gate between this width and gate width is a penalty

PropertyDef.name: OutsidePenalty
PropertyDef.descr: Passing outside the gate costs you this many seconds

PropertyDef.name: ClipGatePenalty
PropertyDef.descr: Clipping the gate costs you this many seconds

PropertyDef.name: IgnoreAfterFirstLap
PropertyDef.descr: True: Not taken into account after first lap. False: Normal behavior.

PropertyDef.name: MaximumPenaltyCount
PropertyDef.descr: Number of penalties to be taken before being disqualified

PropertyDef.name: RaceFirstRacePoint
PropertyDef.descr: First race point of the race. End of RTC starts here

PropertyDef.name: QualificationsFirstRacePoint
PropertyDef.descr: First race point of the qualifications. End of RTC starts here

PropertyDef.name: RaceFirstActivateRacePoint
PropertyDef.descr: First race point of the race displayed during the rtc

PropertyDef.name: QualificationsFirstActivateRacePoint
PropertyDef.descr: First race point of the qualifications displayed during the rtc

PropertyDef.name: QualificationsTimeSpacing
PropertyDef.descr: Spacing in time between qualifications starts

PropertyDef.name: RaceTimeAfterRTCBeforeStart
PropertyDef.descr: Time during which AI controls the plane before the start

PropertyDef.name: AltitudeAboveGroundMaxAllowedFeet
PropertyDef.descr: Maximum altitude above ground in feet

PropertyDef.name: TimeAllowedAboveMaxAltitude
PropertyDef.descr: Maximum time allowed above max altitude

PropertyDef.name: BackOnTrackDistance
PropertyDef.descr: Distance (meters) back the aircraft is teleporte to upon Back On Track

PropertyDef.name: RaceCourseWarningRadiusM
PropertyDef.descr: Radius beyond which a warning is sent to user that he is going to leave race

PropertyDef.name: RaceCourseDSQRadiusM
PropertyDef.descr: Radius beyond which user is disqualified for leaving the race

PropertyDef.name: RaceStartPosition
PropertyDef.descr: Race Start Position

PropertyDef.name: CountdownSeconds
PropertyDef.descr: Length of countdown before race begins

PropertyDef.name: FinishWaitTime
PropertyDef.descr: Number of seconds to wait after first finisher to allow others to finish.

PropertyDef.name: SavedRaceTime
PropertyDef.descr: Saved single player race current racetime

PropertyDef.name: IsDisqualified
PropertyDef.descr: Is the racer disqualified?

PropertyDef.name: PenaltyTime
PropertyDef.descr: Amount of time penalized

PropertyDef.name: RacePointIndex
PropertyDef.descr: Current racepoint index

PropertyDef.name: NumLaps
PropertyDef.descr: Number of laps to complete the race.

PropertyDef.name: NumQualificationsLaps
PropertyDef.descr: Number of laps to complete the qualifications.

PropertyDef.name: LapDistance
PropertyDef.descr: Length of one lap (in miles).

PropertyDef.name: ClockStart
PropertyDef.descr: When does the race clock begin ticking?

PropertyDef.name: ClockStartQualifications
PropertyDef.descr: When does the race clock begin ticking?

PropertyDef.name: RaceType
PropertyDef.descr: Type of the race

PropertyDef.name: Place
PropertyDef.descr: What place did the user come in?

PropertyDef.name: RaceCourseActive
PropertyDef.descr: Does the race course begin active?

PropertyDef.name: TrackRaceLeader
PropertyDef.descr: Camera will track the current race leader rather than a set object.

PropertyDef.name: DisplayRaceMap
PropertyDef.descr: Do we display the race map by default for this race?

PropertyDef.name: RaceMapZoomLevel
PropertyDef.descr: Default Zoom Level: 7 is default - pick a smaller number to zoom in, larger to zoom out

PropertyDef.name: Maneuver
PropertyDef.descr: Symbol to be displayed when this is the next racepoint

PropertyDef.name: Priority
PropertyDef.descr: Priority for a dialog

PropertyDef.name: CanBeSuspended
PropertyDef.descr: A dialog can be suspended

PropertyDef.name: ChecklistStepId
PropertyDef.descr: Name of the checklist step

PropertyDef.name: ATCState
PropertyDef.descr: State of ATC

PropertyDef.name: TrafficState
PropertyDef.descr: State of Traffic

PropertyDef.name: ClearanceState
PropertyDef.descr: State of Clearance

PropertyDef.name: DescrJoystick
PropertyDef.descr: Text for joysticks

PropertyDef.name: DescrGamePad
PropertyDef.descr: Text for gamepad

PropertyDef.name: DescrKeyboardMouse
PropertyDef.descr: Text for keyboard and mouse

PropertyDef.name: GroupName
PropertyDef.descr: GroupName in Wise

PropertyDef.name: ElementName
PropertyDef.descr: ElementName in Wise

PropertyDef.name: FlowStateName
PropertyDef.descr: FlowStateName in Flow

PropertyDef.name: ATCAircraftStateName
PropertyDef.descr: ATCAircraftStateName in Flow

PropertyDef.name: TrafficAircraftStateName
PropertyDef.descr: TrafficAircraftStateName in Flow

PropertyDef.name: FlowSubStateName
PropertyDef.descr: FlowSubStateName in Flow

PropertyDef.name: EventType
PropertyDef.descr: Type of event to trigger action

PropertyDef.name: LeavingDistance
PropertyDef.desc: Distance to trigger on leave actions

PropertyDef.name: Immediate
PropertyDef.desc: Action is fired immediatly in the queue

PropertyDef.name: BreakOnExecute
PropertyDef.desc: Code break if action is executed

PropertyDef.name: SimVarID
PropertyDef.descr: Name of the simvar

PropertyDef.name: SimVarUnit
PropertyDef.descr: return type of the sim var

PropertyDef.name: NameInFormula
PropertyDef.descr: Name of variable in formula

PropertyDef.name: ParameterName
PropertyDef.descr: Name of the parameter

PropertyDef.name: OnActionCompleteFormula
